title: Which wireless earphones are best in comfort and sound? - Quora

response.answer_text: Buy the OnePlus Wireless Bullets. They're really good and can be worn all day without disturbance. However, it is not suitable for Bassheads as the bass doesn't pack a punch like it's Bose and Sony counterparts. But it's the best in it's price range. The battery is also good with around 6–7 hours of playback. It also supports Dash charging
You Will Love TREBLAB headphones. Can’t recommend them enough.
